# stencila-button

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                            | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `href`        | `href`         | The link the button should navigate to | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `isSecondary` | `is-secondary` | The displayed text of the Tab          | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`       | `label`        | The displayed text of the Tab          | `string`  | `undefined` |
